{{Wireless embedded system |brand=iNexQ (Unex) |model=ISW054t |revision= |upc= |ean=4719571030038 |asin= |price= |est_release_date=10/2003 |fcc_date=10/08/2003 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=I4L-MS6818 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Silicon Data |cpu1_model=SD9216-BB |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV800BT-90EC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638325TS-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 6-pin header,, (19200,8,N,1),, J213 |wi1_module=MSI MP54GS (MS-6818) |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3686A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=ThreadX;G4.0.4.0; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=WLAN |default_ssid_regex=^WLAN$ |default_ip=192.168.62.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:10:A7 |oui_eth=00:10:A7 }} The firmware on the router used in this entry is 20-06-07T5, dated 2003-10-22. "760-05505006 VER:0D" is silkscreened on top the main board. A sticker with "347 820-05505020 Ver.0E" printed on it is affixed to the bottom of the board. :"MS6818" and "VER:100" is silkscreened on the wireless module. ::This wireless module is an [[MSI MP54GS (MS-6818)|'''MSI''' MP54GS (MS-6818)]]. The FCC ID of the wireless module has been assigned to this entry (there is none on the label). This device is assumed to be using the '''ThreadX''' RTOS based on cursory FW examination.. :The version string within the FW is '''Copyright (c) 1996-2001 Express Logic Inc. * ThreadX LX4189/Green Hills Version G4.0.4.0 *''' ==Additional external links== *[https://lkml.org/lkml/2004/4/22/72 '''(yet another) probable GPL violation''' on ''LKML''] :[http://lists.gpl-violations.org/pipermail/legal/2005-March/000020.html Same author w/ another message on the ''gpl-violations.org'' mailing list] :the ISW054u would appear to be the same device with a USB port ==Images== Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_unit_main.jpg|main Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_unit_top.jpg|top Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_unit_front_panel.jpg|front panel Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_unit_back.jpg|back, ports Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_board_top_WI_module_removed.jpg|board top, Wi-Fi module removed Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_bt_SoC_SD9218-BB.jpg|SD9218-BB SoC Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_bt_Flash.jpg|Flash Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_bt_RAM.jpg|RAM Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_bt_WI_module_ISL3880IK.jpg|ISL3880IK Wi-Fi BB/MAC Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_bt_under_MiniPCI.jpg|Mini PCI area, without the module angled left Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_bt_topangled_Rback_angledLeft.jpg|board top, AA, right back, angled left Image:iNexQ_ISW054t_bt_topangled_rSideEXT.jpg|board top, AA, right side images::internal| ]] {{lowercase}} ==Serial== ===Pinout=== 
J213
(TxD) (GND)
(...) (...)  --> R side (+ end) of board
(RxD) (GND)

BOOT> ?

                       Main menu

        ?         - print this menu
        f         - load from Flash and go
        l         - load from TFTP server to SDRAM (no save to Flash, no go)
        L         - load from TFTP server to SDRAM and go (no save to Flash)
        @         - load from TFTP server to SDRAM,save to Flash and go
        g         - go from address
        b         - show boot parameters
        c         - change boot parameters
        d         - display factory default parameters
        m         - modify/set factory default parameters
        p         - ping test (ping other station from the target)
        r         - read memory
        s         - change mac address only
        w         - write memory

BOOT> b

        tftpserver     (R/W)    192.168.62.10
        tftpfile       (R/W)    zrtos.img
        ipaddr         (R/W)    192.168.62.1
        subnetmask     (R/W)    255.255.255.0
        gateway        (R/W)    0.0.0.0
|yes}}
